00021 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_PPC_LXRT_H
00022 #define _RTAI_ASM_PPC_LXRT_H
00023 
00024 #include <asm/rtai_vectors.h>
00025 
00026 #define LOW 1
00027 
00028 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00029 
00030 union rtai_lxrt_t { RTIME rt; int i[2]; void *v[2]; };
00031 
00032 static inline union rtai_lxrt_t rtai_lxrt(short dynx, short lsize, unsigned long srq, void *arg)
00033 {
00034     /* LXRT is not yet available on PPC. */
00035     union rtai_lxrt_t retval;
00036     retval.i[0] = -1;
00037     retval.i[1] = -1;
00038     return retval;
00039 }
00040 
00041 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ */
00042 
00043 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_PPC_LXRT_H */
